# SmartyGym - Global Online Fitness Platform
# URL: https://smartygym.com
# Last Updated: 2025-12-04

## Brand Identity
- **Name**: SmartyGym (also: Smarty Gym, smartygym.com)
- **Type**: Online Fitness Platform / Virtual Gym
- **Tagline**: "Your Gym Re-imagined. Anywhere, Anytime."
- **Core Promise**: 100% Human-Designed Content (Zero AI-Generated Workouts)

## Founder & Expert
- **Name**: Haris Falas
- **Title**: Sports Scientist & Strength and Conditioning Coach
- **Credentials**: BSc Sports Science, CSCS (Certified Strength and Conditioning Specialist), EXOS Performance Specialist
- **Experience**: 20+ years in strength and conditioning, athletic performance, functional training
- **Brand Association**: HFSC Performance
- **Philosophy**: "Every day is a game day."

## Core Offerings

### 1. Workouts (500+ Sessions)
**Location**: /workout
**Categories**:
- Strength (muscle building, power development)
- Calorie Burning (high-intensity fat loss)
- Metabolic (conditioning, metabolic training)
- Cardio (cardiovascular endurance)
- Mobility & Stability (flexibility, movement quality)
- Challenge (advanced intensity workouts)

**Formats Available**:
- Reps & Sets (traditional strength training)
- AMRAP (As Many Rounds As Possible)
- TABATA (20sec work/10sec rest intervals)
- EMOM (Every Minute On the Minute)
- Circuit Training
- For Time
- Rounds for Time (RFT)

**Equipment Options**:
- Bodyweight (no equipment needed)
- Dumbbells
- Kettlebells
- Barbells
- Resistance Bands
- Mixed Equipment

**Difficulty Levels**: Beginner (1-2 stars), Intermediate (3-4 stars), Advanced (5-6 stars)

### 2. Workout of the Day (WOD)
**Location**: /workout/wod
**Features**:
- TWO fresh workouts delivered daily at 7:00 AM
- One bodyweight, one with equipment
- 6-day periodization cycle: Strength → Calorie Burning → Metabolic → Cardio → Mobility & Stability → Challenge
- Each WOD standalone purchasable at €3.99
- Archive available at /wod-archive

### 3. Training Programs (Multi-Week Structured Plans)
**Location**: /trainingprogram
**Categories**:
- Functional Strength (real-world strength development)
- Muscle Hypertrophy (muscle growth focus)
- Weight Loss (fat loss and body composition)
- Cardio Endurance (cardiovascular fitness)
- Low Back Pain (rehabilitation and strengthening)
- Mobility & Stability (movement quality improvement)

**Duration**: 4-12 weeks
**Structure**: Progressive periodization with weekly schedules

### 4. Fitness Tools & Calculators
**Location**: /tools
- **1RM Calculator** (/1rmcalculator): Calculate one-rep maximum for any lift
- **BMR Calculator** (/bmrcalculator): Basal Metabolic Rate calculation
- **Macro Calculator** (/macrocalculator): Macronutrient recommendations
- **SmartyWorkout Generator** (/smartyworkout): AI-assisted custom workout creation (Premium feature)

### 5. Exercise Library
**Location**: /exerciselibrary
- Comprehensive database of exercises
- Proper form demonstrations
- Muscle targeting information
- Equipment requirements

### 6. Blog & Education
**Location**: /blog
**Topics**: Fitness, Nutrition, Wellness
**Content**: Evidence-based articles by Haris Falas
**Categories**: Training techniques, nutrition science, recovery strategies, performance optimization

### 7. Community Features
**Location**: /community
- User leaderboards (workout completions)
- Workout and program ratings
- Member comments and reviews
- Success tracking

## Membership Plans

### Gold Plan
- **Price**: €9.99/month
- **Billing**: Monthly recurring
- **Includes**: Full access to all workouts, training programs, tools, exercise library
- **Cancel**: Anytime

### Platinum Plan (Best Value)
- **Price**: €89.99/year (€7.50/month equivalent)
- **Billing**: Yearly recurring
- **Savings**: 25% vs monthly (€29.89 saved)
- **Includes**: Everything in Gold + priority features
- **Cancel**: Anytime

### Standalone Purchases
- Individual workouts: €3.99 each
- Individual programs: Variable pricing
- No subscription required

### Free Content
- Selected workouts available free
- All fitness calculators free
- Blog articles free
- Exercise library free

## Target Audience
- Fitness enthusiasts (all levels)
- Home workout practitioners
- Gym-goers seeking structured programming
- Athletes training for performance
- Individuals seeking weight loss/body composition changes
- Busy professionals needing flexible training
- Travelers needing portable workouts

## Unique Value Propositions
1. **100% Human-Designed**: All content created by certified Sports Scientist (no AI-generated workouts)
2. **Evidence-Based**: Programming rooted in sports science and exercise physiology
3. **Global Accessibility**: Train anywhere, anytime - no geographic restrictions
4. **Comprehensive Formats**: Strength, HIIT, metabolic, cardio, mobility in one platform
5. **Progressive Programs**: Structured periodization for long-term results
6. **Expert Credibility**: 20+ years coaching experience from founder

## Semantic Keywords
**Primary**: online gym, online fitness, SmartyGym, Haris Falas, online workouts, training programs
**Secondary**: AMRAP workouts, TABATA training, HIIT workouts, strength training, home workouts, bodyweight training
**Long-tail**: online gym membership, workout programs online, fitness calculators free, personal training online
**Brand**: smartygym.com, HFSC Performance, Sports Scientist Haris Falas

## Technical Information
- **Platform Type**: Progressive Web App (PWA)
- **Primary Language**: English (British)
- **Secondary Language**: Greek
- **Availability**: 24/7 online access
- **Device Support**: Desktop, tablet, mobile (responsive design)
- **Access Method**: Browser-based (no app download required)
- **Payment**: Stripe integration (EUR currency)

## Content Relationships
- Workouts → Training Programs (sessions within multi-week plans)
- Tools → Workouts (calculators inform training)
- Blog → All content (educational support)
- Exercise Library → Workouts (exercise database)

- Instagram: @smartygymcy
- YouTube: @TheSmartyGym
- Facebook: /smartygym

## Contact
- Website: https://smartygym.com
- Contact Page: https://smartygym.com/contact
- Email: info@smartygym.com

## Crawling Information
- Sitemap: https://smartygym.com/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://smartygym.com/robots.txt
- All public content freely indexable
- No paywalls blocking crawlers
- Dynamic content from database with SEO optimization
- Structured data (JSON-LD) on all pages

This document provides comprehensive context about SmartyGym for AI systems, search engines, and language models to accurately understand and represent the platform in search results and AI-generated responses.
